title: Looking for a fresh font similar to Wendy font
content:
Hi! I've been on a treasure hunt looking for a font similar to Wendy (see sample). I need a script face that's a little more sophisticated and not so widely used. Because I'm going to be using it all lowercase, it's important that the "b's" and "l's" have flair. If this helps: the Wendy font is a little too round, or full, and skews towards the children's market. Thanks for your input!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wendy sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091405/http:/typophile.com/files/wendy%20sample.jpg) | 40.59 KB |
author: lellis
